results.text: Good hit! Roll damage as usual.

Scalding bile! The creature is scarred. While scarred the creature has disadvantage on all Charisma ability checks except Charisma (Intimidation). Being scarred can be healed in the same way as a minor injury.
Good hit! Roll damage as usual.

Melted flesh! The creature is disfigured. While disfigured the creature has disadvantage on all Charisma ability checks except Charisma (Intimidation). Being disfigured can be removed with the spell greater restoration.
Great hit! Roll damage as usual.

Boiling flesh! If the creature is wearing armor its AC modifier is reduced by 1 until it can be repaired (for 1/4th the price of new armor of the same type) or cleaned (if the armor is magical). If the creature is not wearing armor, roll on the minor injury chart

Horrific mutilation! Roll on the minor injury chart. Additionally, the creature is disfigured. While disfigured the creature has disadvantage on all Charisma ability checks except Charisma (Intimidation). Being disfigured can be removed with the spell greater restoration.

Caustic trauma! If the creature is wearing armor, roll on the minor injury chart and its AC modifier is reduced by 2 until it can be repaired (for half the price of new armor of the same type) or cleaned (if the armor is magical). If the creature is not wearing armor, roll on the major injury chart.
Vitriolic! Roll on the major injury chart.

Acid bath! If the creature is wearing armor, the armor is destroyed (if non-magical) or rendered useless until cleaned during a long rest (if magical) and roll on the major injury chart. If the creature is not wearing armor, roll on the major injury chart and the creature is disfigured. While disfigured the creature has disadvantage on all Charisma ability checks except Charisma (Intimidation). Being disfigured can be removed with the spell greater restoration.
